response.overview: This gripping tale of love, loss, and revenge begins with two lovers' intense and all-consuming passion. But as fate tears them apart, their love is put to the ultimate test of separation. As the distance between them grows, the heartache and longing turn to anger and resentment. The lovers' desire for each other slowly transforms into a burning passion for revenge. Will their love be rekindled, or will the fire of revenge consume them? "Lambi Judai" is a thrilling and emotional roller coaster that explores the darkest depths of the human heart.
response.title: Lambi Judai
